articles.content:

articles.author: Colleen Barry
articles.title: Dolce&Gabbana's "light therapy'' collection celebrates life - The Associated Press
articles.description: MILAN (AP) — Dolce & Gabbana are coaxing men off their sofas and back into the world with a resplendent collection inspired by the extravagant lighting installations of southern Italian street festivals.

articles.title: Queen beams as she returns to Ascot after COVID-19 hiatus - The Associated Press
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Queen Elizabeth II was smiling broadly as she attended the final day of the Ascot races on Saturday, where environmental protesters urged the monarch to press politicians to act faster against climate change.

articles.description: The three-day Download Festival in central England is one of a series of test events to see whether mass gatherings can resume without triggering outbreaks of COVID-19.
